bio: I'm Théo 'Phenomene' Hentgen from France, 29 years old, able to work and relocate in any region, i speak French and English, currently learning Portuguese

Played Football for 20 years, been captain of all my teams, that's where i started building leadership
License degree in Sports with Physical and Mental/Psychological courses
Master in communication esport
R6 coach for 6 years

content.value: I provide one-on-one and group coaching sessions with a focus on tactical decision-making and communication.
Sessions include VOD reviews, strategy breakdowns, and live in-game feedback.
I analyze full team gameplay to identify weaknesses and opportunities.
The focus is on synergy, map control, adaptability, and communication structures.

vouches.title: DEAPEK - DUTCH PLAYER
vouches.text: “Huge vouch, Pheno should be in T1 forever and if you don't believe me, just ask for his work !”

vouches.title: FORREST - AMERICAN PLAYER
vouches.text:
“I'd like to thank Pheno for his time and commitment to the team.

His contributions helped us reach our first Major event as a roster

Huge vouch to any teams seeking a +1 !”

vouches.title: REDEEMER - AMERICAN MANAGER & FORMER PRO PLAYER
vouches.text:
“It was a pleasure working with Pheno and appreciate everything he did for our team 

If anyone has any questions about him, please feel free to reach out.”

vouches.title: KOREY - GERMAN FORMER PRO PLAYER
vouches.text: “One of the best coaches out there, I hope teams will recognize his worth !”

contact.text:
You can reach out via mail, X or Discord.

I usually answer within 24 hours.
